greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers k such that the total number of 1's in the binary expansion of all the divisors of k sets a new record.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..120
mathematica: a[n_] := Plus @@ DigitCount[Divisors[n], 2, 1]; am = -1; c = 0; seq={}; Do[a1 = a[n]; If[a1 > am, am = a1; c++; AppendTo[seq, n]], {n, 1, 10^4}]; seq (* _Amiram Eldar_, Dec 17 2019 *)
results.author: _Jason Earls_, May 16 2004
